Name: Epidote Ca_2(Al,Fe^3+)_3O.SiO_4.Si_2O_7.OH
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicate
Subclass: Sorosilicate
Particle Size: Medium
Sample No.: SS-1C
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VSWIR
Origin: USA, Colorado
Collection Date: N/A
Description: Particle size was 45-125um.Collected by Ward's Original ASTER Spectral Library name was jpl.beckman.mineral.silicate.sorosilicate.medium.ss01c.spectrum.txt
Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance

Second Column: Y
X Units: Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:  0.4000
Last X Value:  2.5000
Number of X Values: 826
Additional Information: mineral.silicate.sorosilicate.medium.vswir.ss-1c.jpl.beckman.ancillary.txt
